name: lician-financial-data
description: Access real-time stock prices, financial statements, insider trades, and institutional holdings for 141,000+ companies

tools.name: get_stock_price
tools.description: Get current stock price, daily change, volume, and market cap for a ticker symbol

tools.name: get_income_statement
tools.description: Get income statement data including revenue, gross profit, operating income, net income, and EPS

tools.name: get_balance_sheet
tools.description: Get balance sheet data including assets, liabilities, equity, cash, and debt

tools.name: get_cash_flow
tools.description: Get cash flow statement including operating, investing, financing flows and free cash flow

tools.name: get_financial_metrics
tools.description: Get key ratios: P/E, P/B, ROE, ROA, debt-to-equity, margins, dividend yield

tools.name: get_insider_trades
tools.description: Get SEC Form 4 insider trading activity - buys and sells by executives

tools.name: get_institutional_holders
tools.description: Get 13F institutional ownership data showing major fund holders

tools.name: get_investor_portfolio
tools.description: Get all holdings for a specific institutional investor from 13F filing

tools.name: get_analyst_ratings
tools.description: Get analyst buy/hold/sell ratings and price targets

tools.name: get_company_info
tools.description: Get company profile: sector, industry, description, CEO, employees

tools.name: get_stock_news
tools.description: Get recent news articles about a stock or the market
